question: How much can I borrow for a mortgage if my annual income is $80,000 and I have no other debts?
true_answer: Based on your income and no debts, you can borrow approximately $320,000, assuming a 4x income multiple.

steps.content: How much can I borrow for a mortgage if my annual income is $80,000 and I have no other debts?
Plan: 1) Hand off to home_loan_agent for borrowing capacity. 2) Use calculator for income multiple. 3) Supervisor review. 4) Return answer.
Retrieving knowledge on standard borrowing limits relative to income.
Borrowing limits typically use 3-4 times the annual income as a rule of thumb.
Calculating maximum mortgage borrowing based on $80,000 income.
Calculated borrowing capacity as $320,000 using a 4x income multiple.
Is $320,000 the maximum I can borrow?
Checking if any additional factors might affect the borrowing capacity.
Factors such as credit score and interest rates may adjust final amount.
Assuming good credit score, $320,000 is a reasonable estimate.
What if I want to consider a different loan term?
Retrieving options for different loan terms.
Loan terms can vary from 15 to 30 years, affecting monthly payments more than borrowing limits.
Based on your income and no debts, you can borrow approximately $320,000, assuming a 4x income multiple. Loan term adjustments will affect payment, not borrowing amount.
